invalidFileTypeDesc: Please select a valid image file (e.g., PNG, JPG, WEBP).
fileTooLargeDesc: File is too large. Please select a file smaller than {{maxSize}}MB.
jobTimeoutDesc: The generation process took too long and was stopped. Please try again.
regenDesc: Your content is being rewritten. You can check its progress in your library.
